lyrics.stanza: From the moment I first met Thee, How my heart was filled with joy. Hallelujah! Full joy in me, As Thou flood me without alloy. Oh the sweetest love is this first love; Jesus, O Jesus my love! Far excelling all other loves, Such love reaches me. Such a sweet love, such a true love— Jesus, O Jesus my love!
